show_cd.label: Show Cooldown(seconds)
show_cd.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds to show counter value

set_cd.label: Set Cooldown (seconds)
set_cd.tooltip: prevent different persons form adding at same time

allow_user_change_toggle.tooltip: Enable toggle to allow regulars to change counters
allow_user_change_toggle.label: Enable user change toggle

toggle_to_info.label: permission extra info
toggle_to_info.tooltip: value specification when 'toggle to' is on MP, MR, MH or US

addCommand.label: addCounter
addCommand.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

removeCommand.label: removeCounter
removeCommand.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

editCommand.label: editCounter
editCommand.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

addPermission.label: addCounterPermission
addPermission.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

removePermission.label: removeCounterPermission
removePermission.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

getPermission.label: counterPermission
getPermission.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

getUserChangePermissionGlobal.label: global counterPermissions
getUserChangePermissionGlobal.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

toggleUserChangeGlobal.label: global toggleCounterPermissions
toggleUserChangeGlobal.tooltip: command to be typed, this has to start with a '!'

default_counter_message.label: default_counter_message
default_counter_message.tooltip: the default message displayed when showing a counter

global_permission_toggle_message.label: global_permission_toggle
global_permission_toggle_message.tooltip: the message displayed when toggling global permissions
global_permission_toggle_message.value: the global permission to change counters has been set to {0}, {1}

on_global_permission_message.label: on_global_permission
on_global_permission_message.tooltip: the message displayed when on global permission
on_global_permission_message.value: the counter {0} is on the global permission

specific_permission_message.label: specific_permission
specific_permission_message.tooltip: the message displayed when on a specific permission

counter_not_exist.label: counter_not_exists
counter_not_exist.tooltip: the message displayed when modifying non existing counter (mod commands only)
